directions: Add the sugar, water, and lemon juice in a saucepan over low-medium heat. Stir until you have a wet sand texture, then continue cooking the sugar until you have a clear and amber colored syrup. Do not stir while cooking. Remove from heat.
Pour the sugar into a bundt pan turning it until the pan is coated on the inside.
Prepare the cake mix according to package directions and pour the batter over sugar.
In a separate bowl, mix 1 can condensed milk, 1 can evaporated milk, 4 eggs, 1 tsp. each of vanilla, brandy, and almond extract. Pour over batter. The batter will float to the top... that's okay!

Place the bundt pan in a larger pan (I use a round cake pan) with 1/2" of water and cook at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes. Cover with foil and continue to cook for 20-30 minutes more or until done. Cool 2-3 hours.
ingredients: 1 yellow cake mix (and ingredients from the box)
1 14 oz. can of sweetened condensed milk
title: Happy Mother’s Day: Mom’s Flan Cake
